title: Mathematics & Mechanics of Solids
text:
Mathematics & Mechanics of Solids is a <a href="Peer%20review">peer-reviewed</a> <a href="academic%20journal">academic journal</a> that publishes papers in the fields of <a href="Mechanics">Mechanics</a> and <a href="Mathematics">Mathematics</a>. The journal's <a href="editor-in-chief">editor</a> is David J Steigmann (<a href="University%20of%20California">University of California</a>). It has been in publication since 1996 and is currently published by <a href="SAGE%20Publications">SAGE Publications</a>.
Scope.
"Mathematics and Mechanics of Solids" is an international journal which publishes original research in solid mechanics and materials science. The journal’s aim is to publish original, self-contained research that focuses on the mechanical behaviour of solids with particular emphasis on mathematical principles.
Abstracting and indexing.
"Mathematics & Mechanics of Solids" is abstracted and indexed in, among other databases: <a href="SCOPUS">SCOPUS</a>, and the <a href="Social%20Sciences%20Citation%20Index">Social Sciences Citation Index</a>. According to the "<a href="Journal%20Citation%20Reports">Journal Citation Reports</a>", its 2016 <a href="impact%20factor">impact factor</a> is 2.953, ranking it 72 out of 275 journals in the category ‘Materials Science, Multidisciplinary’. and 11 out of 100 journals in the category ‘Mathematics, Interdisciplinary Applications’. and 13 out of 133 journals in the category ‘Mechanics’.
